member.name: M:_3GSn0w.iPhone3G.iPhoneFile.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by iPhoneFile
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:_3GSn0w.iPhone3G.iPhoneFile.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:_3GSn0w.iPhone3G.iPhoneFile.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies count bytes from buffer to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.name: M:_3GSn0w.iPhone3G.iPhoneFile.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: Sets the position within the current stream
member.param: A byte offset relative to the origin parameter
A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position
member.returns: The new position within the stream

member.name: M:_3GSn0w.iPhone3G.iPhoneFile.Flush
member.summary: Clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

member.summary: Opens an iPhoneFile stream on the specified path

The file to open
A value that specifies the operations that can be performed on the file
